pkgmetadata.longdescription: The pain001 library is a Python package that generates a Customer-to-Bank Credit Transfer payload in the pain.001.001.03 format from a CSVfile.The package is named after the standard file format for SEPA and non-SEPA Credit Transfer, which is the Pain (payment initiation) format001.001.03.The pain001 library provides a convenient way for developers to createpayment files in this format.
